sentences.sentence: "On mine honor, my friend," answered Zarathustra, "there is nothing of all that whereof you speak: there is no devil and no hell."
sentences.translation: “以我的名誉起誓，我的朋友，”查拉图斯特拉回答说，“你所说的根本不存在：既没有魔鬼，也没有地狱。”

sentences.sentence: In witness whereof We have hereunto subscribed our names.
The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
sentences.translation: 耶和华果然为我们行了大事，我们就欢喜。
